name: International Conference on Physiotherapy, Physical Rehabilitation & Sports Medicine
content: The Physiotherapy 2024 held at London, UK (July 15-16, 2024) brings together physiotherapists from across the globe for updates on the latest issues, dissemination of information, and networking. The conference aims to bring together students, physiotherapists, sports medicine professionals, medical faculty and researchers with the aim of exploring the latest developments in the field of physical therapy and sports medicine. The conference focuses on topics such as exercise science, injury prevention, physiologists, kinesiologists, physical therapists, athlete trainers, rehabilitation and nutrition. The unique event includes keynote lectures, panel discussions, workshops, and plenty of opportunity for brand visibility and networking. Attendees also have an excellent opportunity to participate in presentations and clinical demonstrations.
